TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CustomErrorCollection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection
Public NotInheritable Class CustomErrorCollection Inherits ConfigurationElementCollection

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 型別可讓您存取`error`的項目`customErrors`區段項目集合。The type allows access to the `error` elements of the `customErrors` section element collection. 它所屬的群組，其中包含， ，和。It belongs to a group that includes the , , and . ## Examples 此範例示範如何以宣告方式為指定的值`error`的項目`customErrors`區段中，也可存取的項目為集合。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for the `error` elements of the `customErrors` section, which can also be accessed as elements of the collection. 下列組態檔範例示範如何以宣告方式為指定的值`error`項目。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `error` elements. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 更新組態檔之後呼叫的結果方法會取決於選擇。The result of updating the configuration file after calling the method is dependent upon the chosen. 若要更新組態檔，您使用下列其中一個這些兩個多載：和。To update the configuration file, you use one of these two overloads: and . > [!NOTE] > 呼叫相當於呼叫。Calling is equivalent to calling . 如果您使用.method，下列條件都適用。If you use the .method, the following conditions apply. - 如果您傳遞或參數的值，則會顯示`clear`項目插入至`clientTarget`在目前的階層層級組態檔區段。If you pass a or parameter value, then a `clear` element is inserted into the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. - 如果您傳遞參數值、 一連串`remove`項目加入[clientTarget 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17a0fa6e-a065-49cc-b900-ef73eda6a922)在目前的階層層級的組態檔。If you pass the parameter value, a series of `remove` elements are added to the [clientTarget Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17a0fa6e-a065-49cc-b900-ef73eda6a922) of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 每個移除的所有參考`add`在階層中較高層級的父組態檔中定義的項目。Each removes all references to an `add` element defined in a parent configuration file at a higher level in the hierarchy. 當您使用，會影響內容序列化至組態檔的集合上還有一個額外屬性： ，這是`false`預設。When you use , there is one additional property on the collection that affects what gets serialized to the configuration file: , which is `false` by default. 下列條件都適用。The following conditions apply. - 如果設定為`true`，`clear`項目插入至`clientTarget`在目前的階層層級組態檔區段。If the set to `true`, `clear` element is inserted into the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 這會移除所有參考`add`階層中較高層級的父組態檔中定義的項目。This removes all references to the `add` elements defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy. - 如果旗標設為`false`，則`clear`項目移除`clientTarget`目前層級階層，則組態檔區段。If the flag is set to `false`, the `clear` element is removed from the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level, if it exists. 方法實際上會刪除`add`中所定義的項目`clientTarget`在目前的階層層級組態檔區段。The method actually deletes the `add` elements defined in the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 它也會移除所有階層中較高層級的父組態檔中定義的新增項目參考。It also removes all references to the add elements defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy. > [!NOTE] > `add`項目不會刪除從`clientTarget`父組態檔區段。The `add` elements are not deleted from the `clientTarget` section of the parent configuration files. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會移除所有物件從集合。The following code example removes all the objects from the collection. 中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題，以了解如何取得集合。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法插入`remove`項目`customErrors`在目前的階層層級組態檔區段。The method inserts a `remove` element into the `customErrors` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 這會移除參考`add`階層中較高層級的父組態檔中定義的項目。This removes the reference to the `add` element defined in the parent configuration files at higher levels in the hierarchy. > [!NOTE] > `add`項目不會從父設定檔刪除。The `add` elements are not deleted from the parent configuration files. `remove`項目只會停用它們。The `remove` element merely deactivates them. 不過，方法並實際刪除它們在目前的階層層級。However, the method does actually delete them at the current hierarchy level. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何移除具有指定的狀態碼的物件。The following code example shows how to remove the object with the specified status code. 中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題，以了解如何取得集合。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/CS/customerrorssection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/VB/customerrorssection.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法插入`remove`項目`customErrors`在目前的階層層級組態檔區段。The method inserts a `remove` element into the `customErrors` section of the configuration file at the current hierarchy level. 這是要移除的參考`add`在父組態檔中定義的項目階層中的較高層級。This is to remove the reference to the `add` element defined in the parent configuration files at higher-level in the hierarchy. **附註**`add`項目不會從父設定檔刪除。**Note** The `add` elements are not deleted from the parent configuration files. 在只是停用。They are merely deactivated. 不過，方法並實際刪除它們在目前的階層層級。However, the method does actually delete them at the current hierarchy level. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何移除的指定索引處的物件。The following code example shows how to remove the object at the specified index. 中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題，以了解如何取得集合。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/CS/customerrorssection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection/VB/customerrorssection.vb#8)]
